title: Partner rebuilding identity
context: Composite of trailing spouses balancing caregiving, identity shifts and UK job search expectations after relocating.
session_flow: Named practical constraints (school runs, limited childcare) alongside desired role criteria.
Co-designed micro-experiments to test confidence in low-stakes conversations and asynchronous outreach.
Introduced voice-note accountability between sessions to sustain momentum without increasing overwhelm.
boundary_and_consent: Set limits on how much personal history would be shared in reflective exercises.
Agreed that any family-related logistics would be anonymised before entering shared documents.
timeframe: 8 sessions across 4 months while the family settled into new routines.
shift: They rebuilt a sustainable rhythm for outreach that respected caregiving realities.
outcome: Secured two flexible interview processes and articulated non-negotiables without guilt.
disclaimer: Composite scenario anonymised for confidentiality; outcomes vary by individual.
